page.title: 11A SCHOOLGIRL'S STORY
page.content: I get up for school at 8 o'clock, but at the weekends I stay in bed till 10 o'clock. I have a cup of coffee first. Then I feed the rabbits before I go to school. I'm not so keen on school, or doing school work. I look after the school bank with Nancy. I like to do gymnastics on the mat. My favourite friend after school is Nicola. We play tig and hide and seek on her front lawn. My favourite food is strawberries and cream, my favourite drink is shandy. I go to the riding school every Thursday and All Saints Club every Tuesday. After school I buy some sweets and then go home. I feed the rabbits then play outside then watch television. I don't much like helping in the house. I go to bed at 10 o'clock.
